thread.section_title: TRUEFACET Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TRUEFACET | truefacet.com
thread.title: LRC

author: LRC
title: LRC
text: I purchased a Franck Muller ladies watch through True Facet and am thrilled with both the watch and with their customer service. The watch was listed in mint condition and it arrived exactly as it was pictured and described, and two days early! Rachel assisted me in the selection of the watch as I was deciding between a few different models and she was so helpful. My watch is beautiful.
